Package com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BVRecommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback
    Callback used to asynchronously receive the Bazaarvoice product recommendations
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BVRecommendations
    Bazaarvoice Recommendations API for getting custom product recommendations
    RecommendationsAnalyticsManager
    Internal API: Wrapper around AnalyticsManger to form/send analytics events for recommendations events
    RecommendationsContainerView
    Bazaarvoice Provided FrameLayout to display RecommendationView objects
    RecommendationsEmbeddedPageViewSchema
    Created by Bazaarvoice on 4/8/16.
    RecommendationsGridView
    Bazaarvoice Provided GridView to display RecommendationView objects
    RecommendationsListView
    Bazaarvoice Provided ListView to display RecommendationView objects
    RecommendationsRecyclerView
    Bazaarvoice Provided RecyclerView to display RecommendationView objects
    RecommendationView
    Bazaarvoice provided FrameLayout to contain a single Bazaarvoice recommended product.
